summary.content: I’ve finally put together my Portfolio. It includes some of my better work over the last two years, and covers web, print, and 3D design. I plan to add some graphic stuff sooner or later. I haven’t done alot of work, but there’s enough to justify a portfolio. If you are a web professional or HR guy, take a look and let me know how to make it better. I’m always open to suggestions on how to improve, especially for potential employers… =)

content.html:
I’ve finally put together my Portfolio. It includes some of my better work over the last two years, and covers web, print, and 3D design. I plan to add some graphic stuff sooner or later. I haven’t done alot of work, but there’s enough to justify a portfolio. If you are a web professional or HR guy, take a look and let me know how to make it better. I’m always open to suggestions on how to improve, especially for potential employers… =)

Also, I’ve added a sitemap. I must admit that this is my first sitemap. I’ve never had enough content to justify using one until now. Woo-hoo! You can find both links in the menu to the left.
content.plain:
I’ve finally put together my Portfolio. It includes some of my better work over the last two years, and covers web, print, and 3D design. I plan to add some graphic stuff sooner or later. I haven’t done alot of work, but there’s enough to justify a portfolio. If you are a web professional or HR guy, take a look and let me know how to make it better. I’m always open to suggestions on how to improve, especially for potential employers… =)
Also, I’ve added a sitemap. I must admit that this is my first sitemap. I’ve never had enough content to justify using one until now. Woo-hoo! You can find both links in the menu to the left.
content.source:
I’ve finally put together my [Portfolio](/portfolio/). It includes some of my better work over the last two years, and covers web, print, and 3D design. I plan to add some graphic stuff sooner or later. I haven’t done alot of work, but there’s enough to justify a portfolio. If you are a web professional or HR guy, take a look and let me know how to make it better. I’m always open to suggestions on how to improve, especially for potential employers… =)

Also, I’ve added a [sitemap](/sitemap/). I must admit that this is my first sitemap. I’ve never had enough content to justify using one until now. Woo-hoo! You can find both links in the menu to the left.
